hw12
Class ImageSelector

java.lang.Object
  hw12.ImageSelector

public class ImageSelector
extends java.lang.Object

The image selector class. This class provides the functionality to create a Pixels object surrounded by the provided polygon.

Method Detail

select

public static Pixels select(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                            Polygon selectionPoly)
Creates the Pixels object representing the image surrounded by the provided polygon.

Parameters:
image - The image from which the Pixels object will be extracted.
selectionPoly - The polygon that surrounds the selection area.
Returns:
The Pixels object representing the selected image.

                             java.awt.Point pt,
                             java.awt.Color color)
Sets the color of a pixel.

Parameters:
image - The BufferedImage object representing the image
pt - The location of the pixel to be set.
color - The new color of the pixel.

createBorderImage

private static MyImage createBorderImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                         Polygon poly)
On an offline image, draw the border polygon. During creating the pixel store, this image will be checked for testing the edges.

getStartPointOfPoly

public static java.awt.Point getStartPointOfPoly(Polygon poly)
This method picks a point inside the polygon.

Returns:
A point formed by averaging x and y values of vertices.

Displays the border image on a frame for debug purposes.

borderImage - THe border image to be displayed.
